rows.label: tlk70000001_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Friends all twinkly-eyed and bright!
Surely are heroes in the making!

rows.label: tlk70000001_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Received very much help here at
shopping ward. As chairman, Morumo
very, very thankful!

rows.label: tlk70000001_04_msg0003
rows.name:
That why Morumo want to help
friends out...

rows.label: tlk70000001_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Not talking about money or trade!
Just want to pay back kindness.

rows.label: tlk70000001_04_msg0005
rows.name:
If ever in trouble, or need help,
Morumo promise to lend hand.
Please not to forget!
